linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 2.0 brewmaster
  • Processor: 2 core 2GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0 holo
  • Processor: 4 core 3GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

name: Carnage Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 core 2GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 core 3GHZ
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
